name: Ah Ma-zing Workout | Heritage Game Jam 2020
name_original: Ah Ma-zing Workout | Heritage Game Jam 2020
description:
Ahma tries her best to keep fit after working long hours at the hawker center. A game made in a week for the Heritage Game Jam 2020, using Unity game engine, by Aqil Hilmi and Chan Qing.

Controls:

A, Z, M, K to move Ahma's body parts

Esc to quit anytime

R to Replay the main game anytime
